title: Cancer: a research story
creator_credit: Larry Schwab, American Cancer Society, Dephoure Studios and Teleprograms
brief_description: Illustrates the story of the American Cancer Society’s basic research in cancer. This seeks to discover the causes, cures and controls of the disease. The narration is by the former Medical and Scientific Director of the Society, Dr Charles S. Cameron.
creator_credit_for_label: Larry Schwab, American Cancer Society, Dephoure Studios and Teleprograms
